column4: Hi! Is it possible to somehow securely unmount + resize an hda (ext3) from inside the system avoiding the message that it's busy? Like without using GParted or Ubuntu LiveCDs?
if you manage unmounting the partition, it wont be busy anymore :)
you cant unmount hda, you can unmount hdaX or something
then try to close all programs which could use hda2 and retry it
